shortDescription: Triggered when a mouse button is released, or if the screen was no longer touched.

arguments.name: button
arguments.description: The button index that was released. 1 is the primary mouse button, 2 is the secondary mouse button and 3 is the middle button. Further buttons are mouse dependent.

arguments.name: istouch
arguments.description: True if the mouse button release originated from a touchscreen touch-release.
